name: HallOfFame
title: Hall of Fame: Menu Simulations & Screensaver
author: stringweasel
description:
There is a bug in Factorio 1.1.1! See the mod page on how to run this mod.

Factorio has a rich history of amazing creations, from highly optimized builds to beautiful and chaotic spaghetti. Bases that belong in a Hall of Fame.

This mod will play these memorable megabases in the background in the main menu.
